Sentencas: The main problems of small-scale solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) devices are the rapid start-up, durability and operation on available fuels such as methane.
Titulo: Microtubular SOFC anode optimisation for direct use on methane

Sentencas: This paper describes how microtubular anode-supported SOFCs can be started rapidly and run on methane.
Titulo: Microtubular SOFC anode optimisation for direct use on methane

Sentencas: However, the key factor was the activity of the nickel anode, especially its surface area and conductivity, which were found to depend on the reduction method and the operating fuel.
Titulo: Microtubular SOFC anode optimisation for direct use on methane

Sentencas: Controlled reduction experiments in hydrogen at temperatures between 650 and 850 degrees C were performed.
Titulo: Microtubular SOFC anode optimisation for direct use on methane

Sentencas: Reduction temperature and gas composition were altered and the resultant electrical performance and exhaust gases recorded.
Titulo: Microtubular SOFC anode optimisation for direct use on methane

Sentencas: The conclusion was that microtubular SOFC can be successfully run on methane to outperform pure hydrogen by up to 9%.
Titulo: Microtubular SOFC anode optimisation for direct use on methane
